Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.gui

Class ClientListController

java.lang.Object
org.example.proyecto.gui.ClientListController
public class ClientListController extends Object
Controller class for managing the client list view in the GUI. It handles the display, update, deletion, registration, and search of client data.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientListController

      public ClientListController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. Sets up the table columns and loads the client data. Adds a listener to handle selection changes in the client table.

    • registerClient

      public void registerClient()
      Registers a new client with the data provided in the text fields. Validates the input data and shows alerts in case of missing information.

    • updateClient

      public void updateClient(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Updates the selected client with the data provided in the text fields. Validates the input data and shows alerts in case of missing information or no changes.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • deleteClient

      public void deleteClient(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes the selected client from the database. Shows an alert if no client is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • searchClient

      public void searchClient(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Searches for clients based on the data provided in the text fields. Displays the matching results in the client table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • selectClientForBooking

      public void selectClientForBooking(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Selects the client for booking. Opens the booking list view and sets the necessary data for booking.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click.

    • setTemplateComponent

      public void setTemplateComponent(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane templateComponent)
      Sets the template component to be used in the view.
      Parameters:
      templateComponent - the template component.

    • setDataForBooking

      public void setDataForBooking(BookingDataHelper dataForBooking)
      Sets the data for booking and updates the corresponding fields.
      Parameters:
      dataForBooking - the data for booking.

    • setIsSelectingClient

      public void setIsSelectingClient(boolean isSelectingClient)
      Sets whether the client selection button is visible.
      Parameters:
      isSelectingClient - flag indicating if client selection is in progress.
